1.content:
The Thousand Sunny sailed through the Grand Line. Though the ship was majestic, and versatile, it lacked certain qualities that were certainly important on the Grand Line. Namely, the ability to naturally produce food.

"Luffy! We need to stop off on one of these islands to restock out supplies!" The ship's navigator Nami yelled at the young captain. Luffy look at her and blinked.

"What do you mean? We've got tons of food!" He was answered by a shake of Nami's head.

"We finished off almost all of our supplies last night!"

Luffy went a bit slackjawed. "NO MORE FOOD!? WE'RE GONNA DIE!" In traditional Luffy style, he began to freak out.

"Oi, Nami, what about that island over there?" Usopp pointed at a small forested island not far off. Nami began rustling through her charts. "Well.... it's not patrolled by marines... I suppose it will work...." She turned. "Zoro! Get the anchor ready!"

The ship's swordsman dropped the weights he'd been lifting and ran over to the anchor.


Within moments, the ship had docked safely. The strawhats were getting off the ship and looked around. "Alright, we'll split up. Robin, you head out that way with me. Luffy and Sanji, go that way. Zoro, Chopper, Franky and Usopp guard the ship. We'll gather any supplies we need and come back here in three hours." The others nodded and they set off.


As Nami and Robin walked along the beaches, they picked fruits and berries off trees and bushes. Then Robin noticed something out of the corner of her eye...

She ran over towards what looked like a log, but turned out to be a boy! He looked roughly 15, and had darker skin, and messy black hair. He was relatively tall for his age, and had a what might have once been a strong build, but was now horribly malnourished. And unconscious. "Miss Navigator!" Nami ran over to him. "Hmm...." She began checking through his pockets. She gave a sigh. "But he's got nothing on him...." She thought for a moment. "Alright, we'll take him back to the ship. Maybe he might be worth something!" She exclaimed, with her eyes sparkling at the idea of the money he might be worth.

As Nami fantasized, the boy began to wake....
1.title: The boy

11.content:
Nami never even realised that the boy had woken up. you quickly looked around, and scrambled back to the forest behind them.

"Ehh?, Crap! Robin get him back here." Nami ordered.

"Ok,..." She started to walk towords the tree, that you hid behind.

"S-stay back!!!" You stutter. "W-who are you?, do I know you?" You ask.

"No, but we want to know if you are alright, you don't look too well." She said in a rather soft tone. One so, that you felt obliged to stick you head out to answer.

"Y-yeah,...I think so. I...I can't remember much. I think...m-my name is... Nathan."

"Well, Nathan, do you think that you could come out so I don't have to talk to a tree?" She asked sweetly again. You found something wrong here, but you just couldn't put a finger on it. Slowly you came out of you hiding spot. Walking in fronf of the tree, you waited for her to speak again, yet at the same time, ready to run at a moments notice..

"Thanks, that makes this alot easier." she said.
"Huh?" You wondered. A sharp pain hit your neck, and everything went black...

*******************************************

...You started to come too.
"Owww!" That lady moaned. "I swear, it was like a severe case of static"

"Oh stop your whining." A scruff voice came from the left. "So... why did you hit the kid anyway?"

"He wasn't going to get any closer to me, so I did what was nessesary." She responded snyly.
In the back ground you heard a wave crash against wood, that could only mean that you were on a ship... A SHIP!!

"No!!!" You spring up and run to the side of the ship.
Nothing but empty sea.
"You have to take me back!"

"We don't 'have' to do anything you brat!" That scruffy voice said from in back of you.
"You don't understand! Bad things happen when I get wet! I cant remember anything from before that island."You say with a horrified look on your face.

"Hey!!!" A child like voice called out." You're awake! Name's Luffy, thats Zoro, Nami, Chopper, Sanji, Usopp, Franky, and Robin. What's yours?" He asked with a grin on his face.

"N-nathan." You mutter
"Cool!, can I call you Nate?" He asked
"Sure."
Suddenly, just as you actualy felt safe, a wave crashed on the ships side, soaking everybody.
A bright flash, the sound of electricity craked throught the air, and a bloodcurtling scream came next.
Steam, and smoke filled the air, the strawhats looked at your smoking body.

"Alright then... Nathan+water=Very bad!" said Zoro.
11.title: Electrifying!!!!

(You suddenly somehow pass out, you later find yourself waking up in what looks like a sick bay, with Chopper sitting in a stool.)

Chopper: Oh! you're awake, whatever caused water to effect you like that caused you to be comatose for a bi, I have to ask; Do you have a devil fruit power?
112.title: Wake up in a bed.

1122.title: No,

1123.content:
You looked at the wired animal/doctor as he asked you the question. You had no idea what he meant.
"Devil.. Fruit? Whats that?" You asked.

He looks at you kind of funny, and begins explaining.
"Well, Devil Fruit users are certain people who eat fruits with special powers imbedded inside them. Called Devil Fruits. The powers vary, alot, depending on the name, and shape of the fruit. People like Luffy, have incredible power. But eating the fruit makes it so you can no longer swim."

"B-but you guys all sail around water all day.. That doesnt frighten you?" You ask.

"Why should it? The people who are on this ship, are not all devil fruit users, but they all have very special talents."
Chopper noticed that you were starting to nod off.
"Are you even listening to me?!"

You stir slightly, and reply.
"I'm sorry, I feel really weak for some reason.." You could barely lift a finger.

"I've got just the answer!" Chopper said excitedly, as he turned into his Guard Point form carrying you outside to where everybody else was. Putting you down on the ground, he signaled to Nami.
"Okay, he's all set!"

Nami turned to Luffy and asked him, "Are you sure about this? What if it kills him?"

Luffy responded strongly. "I'm sure! I can feel it, ya know?" He said with a grim.
Nami then began swinging her pole around, and a cloud came out of it., Lightning was heard crackling through the air.
This got your attention.
"W-wait a second!" Getting up suddenly, wabbling slightly. "Thats dangerous! What if that K-"

"Thunderbolt-Tempo!" Nami screamed as a bolt of lightning soared through the air, and hit you square in the chest.

. . .
Nothing happened..

Luffy's laughing like a mad-man, as Chopper asked you, "Are you feeling any better?"

"Yeah, how'd you-"

"I told you I knew it! He's got lightning powers!" Luffy said in an outburst, smiling the whole time.

"Lightning?" You asked yourself..
1123.title: Devil... Fruit?

124.content:
Suddenly, Robin sprouted two large arms and pushed Royce onto a water puddle and, in an extremely rare moment of rage, shouted, "TAKE THAT, YOU INSUFFERABLE, F***ING SIMPLETON!" There was even a vein popping out.

Luffy had seen Robin do what she said, and said. "WHOA, ROBIN! WHAT THE HELL!"

Robin cooled down by 50 degrees. "I'm sorry, I lost my cool."

"Yeah, no shi-"

"SILENCE!" Robin flared, silencing Royce. "But yes, the only reason I flared was because that simpleton ruined the grammer of the last chapter."

Nami, scarred for life now, said "Please... don't do that again..." While curled up in a ball.

Luffy said, "Hey, maybe you could join my crew for a little while, at least until we get to another island. You get protection from the dangers of the New World, so you'd be safe."

Royce thought about it, and said:
124.title: Robin Hates Grammer Errors

choices: There’s little threat on the island, and they find food easily.
While there’s little threat, it’s not so easy to find food....
It’s not so easy to find food, and there’s something off about this island.
1241.content:
“Sure, I’m game.” Royce said. “As long as I don’t provoke....Robin’s wraith again? Is that your name, Miss?”

“Robin is my name, yes.” Robin replied. The cross vein in her head had shrunk down, and her extra large back arms vanished out of existence.

“Hold up, while we’re breaking down the fourth wall here....FFFFFFRRRRANNNKKKYYY! PSA.” Franky decided to pipe up with something important. “Robin, I know you’re one of the only ones here that’s properly educated, but remember: this is an Interactive Story. Not every chapter is going to be SUPER GREATO! For every good chapter there’s bound to be five subpar ones, expectations can’t be high for these type of stories. And we can’t have you going off at this guy every time an author with terrible grammar writes a chapter for this branch, else there will be no story to read.”

“But 1-2’s Grammar was atrocious, Franky. You can’t possibly be defending that....” Robin countered, a bit distressed.

“I’m not! I’m just asking that you don’t blow your top like that again, for everyone and the Sunny’s sake.” Franky replied.

“Like, for you that’s seriously OOC how you reacted, Robin.” Ussop nervously injected into the conversation. “You’re supposed to be the only sane man among us! Or only sane woman...“

“Don’t worry, the grammar also ticked me off, Robin.” Zoro muttered, but not ashamed. “That’s why I charged at him. But...shoddy spelling aside, he seems like he can hold his own.”

“All that Franky is asking is that you don’t go into a state of anger that makes me want to sleep in the treasure hold for the next seven nights, Robin.” Nami added in, still curled up into a ball and now terrified of her fellow crew member.
Sanji noticed this. “Oi, Chopper! Make Nami something that will calm her nerves.” he demanded the ship’s doctor, who snapped back at him. “I’m not at your beck and call! But I’ll do it as the ship’s doctor!”

Robin nodded her head, still a little mad. “Don’t worry, Franky, Nami. I will try and keep my temper under control. No promises, though.”

“Couldn’t the reader just go and read another branch, though?” Sanji, Zoro and Usopp piped up at the same time, before looking at each other, annoyed. “Stealing my lines, you crappy chef?” Zoro threatened Sanji, who predictably snapped back. “I could say the same about you, you lazy swordsman!” Ussop wisely kept his mouth shut.

“Not all of the chapters are about Royce, though.” Luffy injected, before he remembered something important! “OH, RIGHT! We gotta find some food! That’s why we stopped here in the first place!”

“I can help with that.” Royce said. “I’m a talented fighter, and it’s not just bluffing. I can hold my own if things go south.”

“So says the blurb.” Robin spoke, not quite convinced. “Anyway, consider this a sort of redemption and test, Royce. If you can help us gather....say, a week and half’s worth of food, I’ll forgive you for any grammar mistakes you make untill the next island.”

“Seems fair, Miss Robin.” Royce boldly said, agreeing to her terms. The Straw Hats and Royce prepared themselves to go a-hunting.










“Three choices?!” Ussop said, looking down at the choices the story could take. “We are spoilt! Hopefully the reader picks an easy path for us......”
1241.title: Fourth Wall? What’s that?

12413.content:
“EHHHHHHHHHH!?!?” Usopp screamed, his voice causing birds to take off in fright and his face contorting in another one of his famous Wild Takes, before rounding on the reader- Yes, YOU! “Why’d you have to pick the hardest choice?! Are you trying to kill us or something, you idiot?!” Chopper chimed in with an an angry ‘Idiot!’ as well, before Nami slapped the two on the back of the head, her fear of Robin forgotten for now as she reprimanded her crew mates for their foolishness.

“Cut it out, you two! Stop insulting the person reading the chapter or they’ll click off and never continue the story!” she yelled at them.

“BUT NAMI!” Ussop shouted back, “What’s the point of having readers if we have to fight monsters and horrors they concoct for their own amusement!? I wanna liveeeeee!”

Royce sweatdropped. “Are....they always like this?” He asked Franky, stunned. “Pretty much, just with less meta text.” was the Cyborg’s reply.

“Oi Oi Oi Oi! Focus, everyone!” yelled Luffy, now with a goal in mind. “We need to focus on getting food! I’ll lead one party, Brook can lead another, and Royce can join whichever group he wants. Seem fair?” The rest of the Straw Hats took a sec to think, and then agreed with Luffy’s plan. The idiot captain then divided the crew up into teams.

“Robin, Zoro, Chopper, Usopp. You’re with Brook.” The members of Team Brook nodded while Ussop trembled slightly. “Hey, um....is it alright if I bring up the rear?” he asked, scared of what horrors could await them. Zoro chuckled. “Nah, you’re going at the front.” Ussop let out a wail of despair at this. “WHY MUST THIS WRITER BE SO CRUEL!?” he dramatically shouted. Meanwhile, Brook chuckled. “Yohoohoohoo! I would trust Usopp with leading the pack over Zoro any day.” This comment got him a sharp “OI!” from an agitated Zoro.

Franky, Sanji, Nami. You’re with me.” Sanji began to do his swooning routine over Nami with a ‘Nami-swannnn~‘ as she breathed a sigh of relief that she was’nt with Robin, or that Zoro wasn’t with Sanji. Meanwhile, Franky did a dramatic pose. “SSSSSUPER! We’ll bust right whatever danger waits on this island!”

That just left Royce Williams to make his pick of which team to go with. “My turn? I’ll pick.....”
12413.title: Hard Paths require a Good Team

13.content:
I Woke up in the arms of a woman with black hair. "Who're you?" I yelled out.
She said "Ohh, Miss Navigator the boy is awake." Nami Suddenly began with questions like " Is your family rich?" and "What is your Name?".
"I got no family they got killed by the Marine, And my name is unimportant, but you can call me Jake."

At last they got back too the ship "Who is that guy" Luffy shouted. "His name is jake, we found at the shore." Nami shouted back.
"Wow is that the infamous pirate Luffy with the Strawhat?" "Yes that is me." "May I become a Part of your crew?"
13.title: Jake

choices: Instead go off to find more food
Run into trouble on the island
14.content:
"Noy Jitat!" shouted the boy as he sat up straight almost hitting his head against Nami's. "Noy Jitat?" asked Nami as she looked at him confused. "Pardon?" asked the boy as he rubbed his eyes. "You just said Noy Jitat...what is that, your name?" answered Nami as she helped him up. "Oh, sorry, sorry that's just a habit of mine when I just randomly say when surprising" answered the boy as he was back on his feet. "So...what sould we call you?" asked Nami as she looked at him head to toe.

"Why..." said the boy as he held her hands ad looked deeply into her eyes; "People call Albert Pitt Liongod, but you can call me Pitt for sort" With that said, he took her right hand and gave it a quick kiss. "Charming" said Nami as she felt herself blush. "Charming in deed" spoke Robin as she just watched everything. "So Pitt..." said Robin as she walked towards him, "do you do that all the girls you meet?"

"Why only to those that are pretty as you girls here" answered Pitt as he smiled at her.

Just then at that moment, Sanji suddenly shook as if he had a feeling that something was wrong with the girls. "What's the matter?" asked Luffy as he saw how Sanji acted. "I don't know why...but I'm strange feeling that someone is trying to take my role" answered Sanji. "As the ship's cook?" asked Luffy as he was confused at he said. "No...something else, come on!" answered Sanji as he rushed off in search of the girls, Luffy following behind.

"So what were you doing all washed up?" asked Robin. Pitt looked at her and then Nami and answered, "To tell the truth...I don't truly remember. All I know is that I was asleep in that thing over there" Pitt pointed to an object that has just washed up on shore. Nami and Robin looked at the object and saw that it was a strange looking egg like shell.

Nami rushed over it and just could't believe how big it was. She leaned in closer and saw that it was all shiny like it was made out of diamonds. "So what..." said Nami as she looked at Pitt, "You woke up from this thing?" "Yeah...I must have gotten out that when it was in the water and the egg washed up later on" answered Pitt.

"Best get a sample of this" said Robin as she used her Devil Fruit powers to cause four hands to grow out of the egg and broke a bit of it's shell. Which was tough to do. Once broken, the hands tossed the piece of the egg shell over to Robin whom caught it. "Right then, we better things to do than just stand out here, lets meet up with others" said Nami as she walked towards where she placed the fruits.

"Others?" asked Pitt as he looked at Nami. "Of course the rest of our crew" answered Nami. "Rest of the crew?" asked Pitt still confused. "We're pirates, wish to come aboard?" answered Robin as she smiled at him. "Please" was all Pitt as said he went along with the girls back to the ship.
14.title: Noy Jitat!

15.content: Here are more personalities including coward.
15.title: He's a coward

152.content:
"Hmm, yeah, that is so good..."

When the dark skinned stranger opened up his eyes, he saw Robin look at him in an amusing glare.

"AHHH!!! IT'S ROBIN FROM THE STRAWHATS!" He then backed into a corner and curled into a ball. "Please don't hurt me. I'm not worthy of you're might. Just leave me here..."

Robin was amused. "And I suppose you make that observation from my bounty, right?"

The strange man looked up and said, "Well, obviously. Third highest bounty means you are the third most effective."

"Navigator, bring the captain and the swordsman here, if that sounds alright."

Nami, having seen the kind of reaction this guy got from seeing Robin, said "Alright, I'll be right back."

The strange man said, "You wouldn't happen to mean Monkey D. Luffy and Roronoa Zoro, would you?"

Robin responded with "Yes, precisely."

"Oh, man, I came on this island to get away from forces of nature, not ram into three more. Why, have you ever seen the New World, It is a hellish place, andIdon'tknowifyouknowthisbutI-"

Luffy appeared, and said, "SHUT UP!" and hit the guy on the head.

"Ow..." he said. Then he looked up and saw Luffy, Zoro, and Robin. "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHAHAHAHAH, NOOOOOOOOO!!!"

Robin told Luffy "He's afraid of us, in case you didn't notice."

"Thank you Robin."

"Anytime."

Zoro had enough of the screaming. "SHUT UP!!! WHO THE HELL ARE YOU?!?"

Having been shut up, the dude responded. "Me? Well, my name is Russel, and I'm an Eelman. I'm currently a drifter, since my last crew marooned me on a World Government island, and I hade to swim THE ENTIRE WAY HERE!"

Luffy, knowing an opportunity when he saw one, said "Hey, how about you join us for a little while? You could use the brief protection from the New World, plus we could bring you to an island that doesn't have Marines on it."

"Thanks," Russel said. "I'll take it."

Considering the series, who is the next person Russel should meet?
152.title: Russel, An Eelman

1521.content:
"AHH, SNIPER KING!!!"

"So who the heck is that guy, Luffy?"

"Usopp, this is our temporary new crew member, Russel. Say hi, Russel."

"Um, hello..."

"Uh, is he okay?"

"He's fine! It's just that he freaked out when he saw Robin, then me and Zoro."

Usopp had a sudden chill. "Oh, then he isn't gonna be too happy when he meets Sanji."

"AAAAAAAHHHHH! WHAT THE HELL IS THAT?"

Luffy and Usopp took to the deck.

"Hey Usopp. Think you can take that Sea King out with one hit?"

Usopp got prepared. "Behold, the weapon I hold in my hand. The Black Kobuto! Special Attack: CANNON BALL STAR!!!"

And with that, Usopp released the mighty Cannon Ball Star, taking the Sea King out with one hit.

"And that is why I'm the great a and powerful Usopp! HAHAHAHA!"

But Russel could only stare. "Are all of you guys ridiculously strong?"

And then Brook popped up. "Oh you better believe it."

The two looked at each other. Then, "AAAAAAAAAHHHHHH!!!"
1521.title: Even Usopp Isn't THAT Scared

choices: Sanji is in.  Shit goes down.
15211.content:
"WHY IS THERE A SKELETON MAN ON THE SHIP?!?"

Brook then replied. "Oh, me? Well I ate the Revive-Revive Fruit, which allowed me to come back from the dead, yoho!"

Russel was nerve wracked from today. "And you came back as... that?"

"Oh yes. It was something I couldn't stomach... or rather, I wouldn't, IF SKELETONS HAD STOMACHS! SKULL JOKE! YOHOHOHOHOHOHO!"

What the hell is up with this crew? Russel thought. These guys are both powerful AND insane!

Then again, he thought, that just makes it safer for me to travel through the New World. I think I'm safe here...

"By the way, Luffy" Russel asked, "how old are you?"

"Who, me?" Luffy then answered, "19."

"Oh..."

"What?" Luffy asked.

"I'm 15."

Luffy looked at Russel, then laughed heartily, and said, "Wow! Looks like we have a junior on board!"
15211.title: The New World Is Jacked Up

choices: "Actually, I want to meet the others."
152111.content:
Then Sanji came in. "Hey, Luffy. I heard you say we had a junior on board. Is that weak looking Fishman him?"

Russel was feeling woozy. "How many of you titan's are on this ship? Black Leg Sanji, right? You look better than the bounty poster you have, and especially better than the previous."

Sanji picked up on what he was saying. "Finally! Someone who treats me nicer about that poster."

"My name is Russel. Nice to meet you.." He said, before trembling. "Who am I kidding? I'M NOT WORTHY OF YOU GUYS!!!"

Luffy then said, "Why don't you relax for a while, Russel?"
152111.title: Sanji Is In.  Shit Goes Down.

info.brief_description: The strawhats find a boy washed up on shore. But this boy wants to become a pirate!
info.description:
While resting on an island, the Strawhat pirates find a teenage boy washed up on shore. Upon awakening, he discovers who he is in the custody of and he demands to join their crew! He is a talented fighter, who can definately prove himself if that's what it takes! How his personality is, and what his fighting style is though, is up to you!

-Bloodshed is allowed
-Romance is allowed
-I would like to keep sexual scenes to a minimum. This is One Piece after all. References are okay.
-Have fun!

I'm not one of those people who will let you guys write for my own enjoyment. I'll help the story along periodically, or if it's going slowly.
